a game that occupied most of my leisure time. Many players started shifting toward to other platforms rather than playing on the matchmaking itself is because that the VAC system functioned not quiet efficiently or responsively. Cheats flooded into the community and started becoming an industry. A great game to play but, valve, please fix your anti-cheat.
